name: Space turtle (Gleefre)
description:
Made for 1-button jam 2022. (Even though its a bit too late.)

Space turtle is a game about gathering apples with one button.

It was started as a simple snake clone, and it didn't really evolved much... But it is a different game :)

This game is published under Apache 2.0 Licence.

Source code can be found on github: https://github.com/Gleefre/space-turtle. Read README file to learn more about running game from source (it will be added later). This game is "working on my computer", if you are unable to run it or if you encounter bugs, please create an issue on github repository.
